snippet: A manhunt for a fugitive accused of a double slaying and kidnapping two children ended Thursday after the suspect apparently shot himself and died.
abstract: Manhunt for Adam Mayes, fugitive accused of a double slaying and kidnapping two children, ends after Mayes shoots and kills himself in New Albany, Miss; both children, Kyliyah Bain age 8 and Alexandra Bain age 12, were found safe.
lead_paragraph: A manhunt for a fugitive accused of a double slaying and kidnapping two children ended Thursday after the suspect apparently shot himself and died.

headline.main: Mississippi: Abducted Girls Safe After Suspect Dies
headline.print_headline: Mississippi: Abducted Girls Safe After Suspect Dies
